snippet.title: The Italian Job - Full Game Walkthrough (All Missions)
snippet.description:
The Italian Job Full Game Walkthrough with all story mission recorded in full HD on PC.

London, 1969. Charlie Croker has just finished a three year stretch, courtesy of Her Majesty's Prisons, and has been offered a new job by Mr. Bridges: to steal 4,000,000 dollars in gold bullion, right from under the noses of the Mafia and the Turin Police.

Mission Times:
00:00 - Intro
01:28 - The Ambassador's Car
03:36 - Meet Camp Freddie
05:54 - Peaches for Peaches
07:50 - Special Delivery
10:13 - Skilful Bill
12:35 - Prison Pals
14:53 - Keeping it Up
17:51 - Big William's Ride 
20:56 - Torino Tours
30:12 - Mafia Mania
34:02 - Traffic Tape Caper
42:44 - Interference 
50:22 - Convoy 
52:41 - The Getaway 
1:00:06 - Red, White and Blue
1:02:22 - Home Free
1:05:53 - End Cutscene & Credits

● Platform: Windows PC (Also available for PlayStation 1)
● Recorded using Nvidia Shadowplay
● Rendered/Edited using Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2014

Stay Connected:
● http://www.facebook.com/willzyyygta
● http://www.twitter.com/willzyyy
● https://www.instagram.com/willzyyy_yt
